contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox film | name = Quando Elas Querem | image = | image_size = | caption = | director = [[Eugenio Centenaro Kerrigan]], Paolo Trinchera | producer = Adalberto de Almada Fagundes, [[Eugenio Centenaro Kerrigan]] | writer = Adalberto de Almada Fagundes, [[Eugenio Centenaro Kerrigan]] | narrator = | starring = [[Luiz de Barros]] | music = | cinematography = [[Luiz de Barros]] | editing = | distributor = | released = 1925 | runtime = | country = [[Brazil]] | language = Silent | budget = }} '''''Quando Elas Querem''''' is a [[1925 in film|1925]] [[Brazil]]ian [[comedy film]] directed by [[Eugenio Centenaro Kerrigan]]. The film premiered in [[Rio de Janeiro]] on December 9, 1925. ==Cast== *Bertoli Carmelo as Alberto *[[Luiz de Barros]] *César Fronzi *Yolanda Fronzi *Regina Fuína *Jardel Jercolis *Laura Letti as Clarinda *Anésia Pinheiro Machado *Emílio Marangoni *Mado Mirka *Salvador Tarantino as Benedito ==External links== * {{imdb title|id=0194289|title= Quando Elas Querem}} [[Category:1925 films]] [[Category:Black-and-white films]] [[Category:Brazilian silent films]] [[Category:1920s comedy films]] {{Brazil-film-stub}} {{1920s-comedy-film-stub}} {{silent-comedy-film-stub}}
